short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For use on https://archived.moe. Download all images, gifs, and videos within an archived 4chan thread.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You must be on an archived 4chan thread on https://archived.moe

This extension will Download all images, gifs, and videos on the tab that contains an archived 4chan thread. In the background the files are saved to a blob, then that blob is saved as a zip file, the zip file is then downloaded once all files are downloaded and included. ( Does not work anywhere but on threads with images on https://archived.moe)
